admin.description: Basic administrative panel. Use the links below to manage the system.
admin.manageUsersCard: Manage user accounts, roles and status
admin.name: Name
admin.serviceSetOnGoingFailed: Failed to set service to On-going

home.title: Home
home.offlineMessage: You are offline. Showing cached dashboard data when available.
home.recordData: Record your data immediately to help us better track your health status.
home.getAdvice: Get personalized health advice powered by AI, based on your heart rate data and health trends.
home.adminPasswordNote: You are setting a new password for this user.

overallAnalysis.title: Overall Analysis
overallAnalysis.noData: Not enough data to analyze. Add BMI, heart rate and stress records.

summary.excellent: Excellent overall health based on current BMI, heart rate and stress.
summary.good: Good overall health. Keep maintaining healthy habits.
summary.fair: Fair health. Consider small improvements to lifestyle.
summary.poor: Indicators suggest potential concerns. Consider consulting a healthcare professional.
summary.critical: Critical condition detected — seek immediate medical attention.

advice.underweight: Increase caloric intake with nutrient-dense foods and consult a nutritionist.
advice.maintain: Maintain current habits: balanced diet and regular exercise.
advice.overweight: Consider weight management strategies: diet, regular exercise, and professional guidance.
advice.obese: Seek a healthcare provider for a structured weight loss plan and monitoring.
advice.highHr: Reduce stress and stimulants; consult a doctor if high heart rate persists.
advice.lowHr: If you experience symptoms with low heart rate, seek medical advice.
advice.moderateStress: Manage stress with relaxation techniques, regular sleep, and consider counseling if persistent.
advice.highStress: High stress detected — prioritize stress reduction strategies and consult a professional if necessary.
advice.critical: Seek immediate medical attention or call emergency services if you feel unwell.

offline.title: Offline
offline.message: You are currently offline. Showing cached data when available.

cached.title: Cached Data
cached.message: Displaying previously downloaded data. Connect to get latest updates.

chat.description: Message your healthcare provider directly and get timely support for your health concerns.

dataSettings.uploadCSV: Upload raw CSV File for Health Data
dataSettings.uploadCSVHelper: Add raw CSV file of health data, the system will convert to required format after uploading
dataSettings.clickToUpload: Click to upload or drag and drop
dataSettings.processingCSV: Processing CSV to the required format...
dataSettings.noMatchingKey: No heart_rate or stress rows found
dataSettings.fillHeightWeight: Please fill in height and weight
dataSettings.saveFailed: Failed to save BMI data. Please try again.
dataSettings.deleteBMIConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete your BMI data? This action cannot be undone.
dataSettings.deleteFailed: Failed to delete data. Please try again.
dataSettings.invalidCsvSelect: Please select a valid CSV file
dataSettings.invalidCsvDrop: Please drop a valid CSV file

dataSettings.deleteAllConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete all heart rate records? This action cannot be undone?

dataSettings.deleteAllStressConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete all stress records? This action cannot be undone?

formatSettings.title: Settings
formatSettings.subtitle: Customize your application preferences
formatSettings.appearanceDesc: Choose how the application looks for you
formatSettings.themeDesc: Switch between light and dark mode
formatSettings.lightModeDesc: Bright and clean interface for daytime use
formatSettings.darkModeDesc: Easy on the eyes in low-light conditions
formatSettings.autoThemeDesc: Automatically switch theme based on system preference

userSettings.title: Account Settings
userSettings.subtitle: Manage your account information and preferences
userSettings.profileDesc: Update your account's profile information and email address.
userSettings.name: Name
userSettings.changePasswordDesc: Ensure your account is using a long, random password to stay secure.
userSettings.deleteAccountWarning: Once your account is deleted, all of its resources and data will be permanently deleted.
userSettings.deleteAccountDesc: Please download any data or information you wish to retain before deleting your account.
userSettings.enterPasswordToConfirmDeletion: Enter your password to confirm deletion
userSettings.adminCannotDeleteSelf: Admins cannot delete their own account. Please contact another administrator or system owner.

aiSupport.title: AI Support Chat
aiSupport.subtitle: Chat with AI for assistance and support
aiSupport.noMessages: No messages yet. Start a conversation!
aiSupport.welcomeDesc: Start a conversation with AI. Ask me anything!
aiSupport.settingsDisabled: Settings disabled while AI is responding
aiSupport.waitForResponse: Please wait until the current response is finished
aiSupport.deleteAllConfirm: Are you sure you want to DELETE ALL conversations? This cannot be undone.
aiSupport.temperatureDesc: Controls randomness. Lower = deterministic, higher = more creative.
aiSupport.maxSourcesDesc: Limits number of external sources used by AI (0 = none).
aiSupport.maxTokensDesc: Limit tokens used by model for each request (advisory).
aiSupport.sendFailed: Failed to send message. Please try again.

underweight.0: What are healthy ways to gain weight?
underweight.1: What diet should I follow to increase my weight safely?

normal.0: How can I maintain my healthy weight?
normal.1: What exercises are best for my current BMI?

overweight.0: What are effective strategies for healthy weight loss?
overweight.1: How can I create a sustainable weight loss plan?

obese.0: What exercises are safe for obese individuals?
obese.1: How can I start a weight loss journey safely?

heartRate.0: What do my heart rate trends indicate?
heartRate.1: What's a healthy resting heart rate for me?

stress.1: What can I do to better manage stress?

chat.title: Chat
chat.startConversation: Start a conversation with your healthcare provider
chat.sendHint: Press Enter to send, Shift+Enter for new line
chat.autoResponse: Thank you for your message. Your healthcare provider will respond soon.
